name: part_012
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Shining Memory ⧸ ラストに重大告知‼【#星街すいせい5周年LIVE 】 [GbIIr3waYzI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Hoshimachi Suisei announces her collaboration CM for HAL, mentions its TV broadcast, and introduces the next VTR.
A VTR trailer for Midnight Grand Orchestra's 1st LIVE 'OVERTURE' Blu-ray/DVD release and the announcement of their 2nd Mini Album.
A VTR trailer for the 'Michizure' music video premiere, featuring English narration and a preview of the song.
Performance of the song 'NEXT COLOR PLANET (2023 ver.)' with backup dancers.

subtitles.original: …ことになりました！
subtitles.english: …it has been decided!

subtitles.original: 曲を誰が作ったかは明日発表されるみたいです。
subtitles.english: The composer of the song will apparently be announced tomorrow.

subtitles.original: CMは24日金曜日からHALのホームページで見れますので、ぜひチェックしてください。
subtitles.english: The CM will be available on HAL's website from Friday the 24th, so please check it out.

subtitles.original: そして、このCMはなんとテレビでも流れるんです。
subtitles.english: And, this CM will actually be shown on TV as well.

subtitles.original: 見た人はぜひツイートで教えてください！
subtitles.english: If you see it, please let me know via tweet!

subtitles.original: ふぅ、一息ついて。
subtitles.english: Whew, catching my breath.

subtitles.original: では、次のVTR行きますよ、ドン！
subtitles.english: Now, here's the next VTR. Boom!

subtitles.original:
MIDNIGHT GRAND ORCHESTRA 1st LIVE
OVERTURE 2023.06.14 Blu-ray & DVD Release
subtitles.english:
MIDNIGHT GRAND ORCHESTRA 1st LIVE
OVERTURE 2023.06.14 Blu-ray & DVD Release

subtitles.original:
Midnight Grand Orchestra
2nd MINI ALBUM 制作決定！
subtitles.english:
Midnight Grand Orchestra
2nd MINI ALBUM production confirmed!

subtitles.original: Hello everybody. Thanks for joining the Real World Arcade party.
subtitles.english: Hello everybody. Thanks for joining the Real World Arcade party.

subtitles.original: Are you ready? Yes, it's you over there with the heavy burden on your shoulders.
subtitles.english: Are you ready? Yes, it's you over there with the heavy burden on your shoulders.

subtitles.original: Give these star lights back to you. Why don't you come out with me? Let's go!
subtitles.english: Give these star lights back to you. Why don't you come out with me? Let's go!

subtitles.original:
みちづれ
配信終了後 MVプレミア公開
subtitles.english:
Michizure
MV premiere after the stream

subtitles.original: いつも通りはいついつまでも…
subtitles.english: As usual, forever and ever…

subtitles.original: 星が揺らいで　秘密を見ている
subtitles.english: Stars are wavering, watching our secrets

subtitles.original: 焦がれたその音が　待ってるの
subtitles.english: The sound I longed for is waiting

subtitles.original: 煌めく心　秘めてる日々に
subtitles.english: To the days holding my sparkling heart hidden

subtitles.original: 届けるこのメロディ
subtitles.english: I deliver this melody

subtitles.original: 窓から覗いた　雨降る街並みを
subtitles.english: Looking through the window at the rainy cityscape

subtitles.original: 弾ける音だから　ポケットに詰め込んで
subtitles.english: Since they're popping sounds, I'll stuff them in my pocket

subtitles.original: ラッタッタ　君の好きな　ちょっと
subtitles.english: Rat-tat-tat, to a slightly

subtitles.original: いなせなステップに乗せて
subtitles.english: Stylish step that you like

subtitles.original: 魔法のような　ナイトが
subtitles.english: A night like magic

subtitles.original: 私を照らしてる
subtitles.english: Is shining on me

subtitles.original: 星を繋いで　夢を描くよ
subtitles.english: Connecting the stars, I'll draw a dream

subtitles.original: 焦がれたその声が　呼んでるの
subtitles.english: The voice I longed for is calling

subtitles.original: 煌めく心　もっともっと君に
subtitles.english: My sparkling heart, even more to you

subtitles.original: 届けるこのメロディ
subtitles.english: I deliver this melody

subtitles.original: このままじゃね　終われない
subtitles.english: It can't end like this

subtitles.original: 特別なステージ　踊り明かすの
subtitles.english: Dancing through the night on a special stage

subtitles.original: このままじっとしてられない
subtitles.english: I can't just stay still like this

subtitles.original: 走り出そうよ　明日は晴れるから
subtitles.english: Let's start running, for tomorrow will be sunny

subtitles.original: 夜が醒めない　カーテンを開いても
subtitles.english: The night doesn't awaken even if I open the curtains

subtitles.original: 憂鬱空想だって　ゴミ箱へ流した
subtitles.english: I've even flushed melancholy fantasies into the trash

subtitles.original: レッツゴー　いつも着てた　ちょっと
subtitles.english: Let's go, changing into my slightly

subtitles.original: 勝負服に着替えて
subtitles.english: Stylish go-to clothes

subtitles.original: 魔法のような　ドレスが
subtitles.english: A dress like magic

subtitles.original: ふわりと翻る
subtitles.english: Flutters softly

subtitles.original: 満天の星空にほら　浮かべてみて
subtitles.english: Look, try floating in the starry sky

subtitles.original: 明日の星を
subtitles.english: Tomorrow's star
